mapper.select:
SELECT worker_detailed.id, worker_detailed.worker_id, worker_detailed.is_come_in, worker_detailed.remarks, worker_detailed.frame_number, worker_info.worker1 AS workerName, worker_info.ip, worker_info.state, factory_house.factory_name, frame_setting.frame_name, group_setting.group_name, workerbrand_setting.brand_name FROM worker_detailed, worker_info, factory_house, frame_setting, group_setting, workerbrand_setting
worker_detailed.is_delete = 0 AND worker_detailed.is_come_in = 1
AND (group_name like #{keyWord})
AND worker_detailed.worker_id = worker_info.id AND worker_info.tenant_id=#{tenandId} AND worker_detailed.factory_id = factory_house.id AND worker_detailed.frame_id = frame_setting.id AND worker_detailed.group_id = group_setting.id AND worker_detailed.workerbrand_id = workerbrand_setting.id

mapper.select: SELECT group_setting.group_name, worker_detailed.worker_ip, workerbrand_setting.brand_name, worker_info.state FROM worker_detailed, group_setting, workerbrand_setting, worker_info WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND worker_detailed.group_id = group_setting.id AND worker_detailed.workerbrand_id=workerbrand_setting.id AND worker_detailed.worker_id=worker_info.id AND worker_info.tenant_id=#{tenandId}
mapper.update: update worker_detailed set worker_id = #{workerId}, user_id = #{userId}, workerbrand_id = #{workerbrandId}, worker_ip = #{workerIp}, is_come_in=1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, frame_number FROM worker_detailed WHERE frame_id = #{frameId} AND is_come_in=0

worker_id= #{item} AND is_come_in=1
